value.title: Buttigieg: No Plan To Increase Gas Or Mileage Tax In Biden Infrastructure Plan
value.excerpt: Secretary of Transportation Pete Buttigieg pledged on Monday that the Biden infrastructure plan will not feature a tax hike on gas or mileage for those with incomes less than $400,000 in an interview with CNN host Jake Tapper.

value.title: 'True local control': More than 100 mayors urge Biden to bypass states, provide COVID-19 vaccines directly to cites
